full_output.summary: Final-year undergraduate with a strong foundation in Computer Science and hands-on experience in Systems Software Development and AI/ML. Proficient in programming languages and various technologies including virtualization, microservices, and modern UI frameworks. Adept at full product development life cycle from design to support. Demonstrates leadership and a commitment to high-quality standards.

projects.name: Music Recommendation System Using Python
projects.description: Developed a music recommendation system to analyze user preferences and deliver personalized recommendations. Employed Pandas for data manipulation, scikit-learn for recommendation algorithms, and Matplotlib for data visualization. Implemented preprocessing, feature engineering, and similarity metrics.

projects.name: Brain Stroke Identification
projects.description: Developed a machine learning model to classify brain images for stroke detection, enhancing healthcare diagnostics. Conducted model evaluation using accuracy metrics, ROC curves, and cross-validation.

experiences.description: Contributed to a Django project focusing on web development and database management. Enhanced user interfaces, optimized database queries, and improved application performance.
Conducted sentiment analysis involving data preprocessing, model development, and analysis using machine learning techniques.
